channel.title: What do you find difficult/confusing about Linux?
channel.description:
So, some of my blogs crashed and burned and need replacing, so I'm whoring you all out for content research, yo.
If one was to write clear, concise tutorials/howtos/explanations on various things that are still "difficult" on Linux - what would you like to see? What do you still struggle to understand?

item.title: What do you find difficult/confusing about Linux?
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Write a guide to installing Arch. Took me a little longer than I feel it should have to get it fully working properly.
Though, my attention span didn’t help when it came to reading what I needed to do. I would normally just quickly scan through it.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you find difficult/confusing about Linux?

item.title: What do you find difficult/confusing about Linux?
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

Things like compatibility and drivers. I don’t get how to set up compiz with my matrox card.

The gentoo instructions were different from what the installer did; I wiped out my hard drive.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you find difficult/confusing about Linux?

item.title: What do you find difficult/confusing about Linux?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Most of the problems do I get solved by Google, but compiling is that I have most problem with.
And Wireless card.

Read full topic
